title: UNC Asheville Innovation Translation Lab Launch
description: Excited to help launch the UNC Asheville CS Innovation Lab with Dr. Kevin Sanft and NCInnovation, connecting faculty expertise and studio-based student teams to translate research into impactful, real-world technology.

title: YW Tech Lab Website Launch: The AUX
description: Our second YW Tech Lab website, The AUX. A huge congratulations to the team!

title: NSF BRAID Grant Awarded
description: Honored to serve as a Co-PI on an NSF grant supporting research on neuromorphic systems and their broader societal and ethical impacts.

title: Answer the Moment Website Launch
description: Excited to announce the launch of our first YW Tech Lab website, Answer the Moment. Congratulations to our creative, dedicated, and talented web developers!

title: Joining UNC Asheville, Fall 2022
description: I'm thrilled to be joining the Computer Science Department at UNC Asheville this Fall!

title: Racial Equity & Community Partnership Grant Recipient
description: Happy to be a recipient of the 2022 Racial Equity & Community Partnership Grant to continue supporting the web design apprenticeship program with the YW Tech Lab!
